# ConsoleBufferCell.WithCharacter method

Generate a new cell with a different character, but the same foreground and background as the current cell.

```csharp
public ConsoleBufferCell WithCharacter(char c)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| c | New character of the returned cell. |

## Return Value

New ConsoleBufferCell.
